channel.title: R Package on
channel.description: Recent content in R Package on

item.title: What’s New in kableExtra 0.7.0
item.description: kableExtra 0.7.0 is on CRAN now. This update includes quite a few long-waited new features, including immediate display of HTML table in the Viewer panel and a remake for footnote (in replacement for add_footnote), and some important bug fixes. New Features Live view of HTML table in RStudio HTML tables generated through kableExtra now has its own class and will be previewed in the Viewer panel when it’s printed.
